item.title: Permanent home for firewall-admin
item.description:
The little recipe I posted for a dedicated Linux firewall with a CherryPy powered administrative interface finally has a [permanent home over at Google Code][2].

Many thanks to Kyle Waremburg for creating the project page and helping me develop [firewall-admin][2]! I hope other people find it useful.

[2]: http://code.google.com/p/firewall-admin/
